content.en: Ventilation algorithms: Researchers are investigating various algorithms used in mechanical ventilation to improve patient outcomes. These algorithms, such as high-frequency oscillatory ventilation and proportional assist ventilation with load-adjustable gain factors, aim to minimize lung injury and provide effective support to critically ill patients. Other algorithms, like adaptive-support ventilation and decision support systems, are being studied to determine if they can shorten the time patients spend on mechanical ventilation and improve the management of ventilator settings.
content.da: Ventilationsalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer brugt i mekanisk ventilation for at forbedre patientresultater. Disse algoritmer, såsom højfrekvent oscilleringsventilation og proportional assist-ventilation med belastningsjusterbare gevinstfaktorer, sigter mod at minimere lungeskader og yde effektiv støtte til kritisk syge patienter. Andre algoritmer, som adaptiv støtteventilation og beslutningsstøttesystemer, bliver studeret for at afgøre, om de kan forkorte tiden, patienter bruger på mekanisk ventilation og forbedre håndteringen af ventilatorindstillinger.
